nodes.text: Palsaang was a wroshyr tree-city on Kashyyyk. It was home to the Palsaang clan, and site of a raid during the Clone Wars.

Palsaang was a Wookiee city located in a wroshyr tree on the planet Kashyyyk. Gumbaeki was one of the elders in Palsaang. The Wookiees of the village painted elaborate tales on the trunk of the village's trees.
The city was home to the Palsaang clan. During the Battle of Kashyyyk, it was raided by Trandoshan slavers led by Karniss.
Palsaang appears in the comic arc Star Wars: Republic: Hidden Enemy.
